channel.title: Why we share our concepts
channel.description:
We lead with value. We proactively do things we believe the world needs, and work with collaborators towards common goals.
This section outlines a number of projects we'd like to start - ideally with partners and collaborators.
If you'd like to work with Source, this is the place to get involved.
